CustomField.description: Returns the expected persona, based on title and seniority
CustomField.formula: IF(ISBLANK(Title),"Unknown", IF( OR(CONTAINS( LOWER(Title),"engineer"),CONTAINS( LOWER(Title),"developer"), CONTAINS( LOWER(Title),"architect"), CONTAINS( LOWER(Title),"cto"), CONTAINS( LOWER(Title),"agile"), CONTAINS( LOWER(Title),"tech"), CONTAINS( LOWER(Title),"software")),"", IF(CONTAINS(LOWER(Title),"product"),"Product", "Other")))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Returns the expected persona, based on title and seniority
CustomField.label: Persona
